content: X-MC LS 5.6/6 Steel marking stamps Round-tipped, narrow letter and number characters for stamping identification markings onto metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features A more efficient alternative to stamping letters and numbers onto steel by hand Helps increase user comfort, safety and productivity Faster and more reliable â€“ 5 seconds per marking Use up to 10 characters at a time on the marking head Low-stress characters deform rather than cut the surface of the base material Applications Marking on metal surfaces for identification, traceability and quality control in steelworks, manufacturing plants, testing institutes, etc. Marking on slabs, blooms, billets and ingots as well as light-, medium- or heavy-duty steel sections ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Marking cold steel, Marking hot steel For use with (tools): DX 462 CM, DX 462 HM Character type: Low stress Technical Data | Application | Marking cold steel, Marking hot steel | For use with (tools) | DX 462 CM, DX 462 HM | Character type | Low stress | Character font height | 0.24 in | Base materials | Steel ### ITEMS- 8116 -
